source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_dsa_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_dsa_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ims_data_sharing_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSDSAID
        ELSE NULL
    END AS IMSDSAID, -- surrogate key
    "No Info" AS DSAID,
    "No Info" AS DSAIDCoded,
    T1.name AS DSAName,
    T1.assigned_user_id AS DSAAssignedUserID,
    T1.assigned_user_name AS DSAAssignedUserName,
    T1.ims_data_sharing_number AS DSANumber,
    T1.type AS DSAType,
    T1.status AS DSAStatus,
    T1.priority AS DSAPriority,
    T1.data_being_shared_c AS DSADataBeingShared,
    T1.direction_c AS DSADirection,
    T1.why_shared_c AS DSAWhyShared,
    T1.how_shared_securely_c AS DSAHowSharedSecurely,
    T1.how_stored_securely_c AS DSAHowStoredSecurely,
    T1.frequency_c AS DSAFrequency,
    T1.lawful_basis_c AS LawfulBasis,
    T1.personal_data_c AS DSAPersonalData,
    T1.special_category_data_c AS DSAPersonalCategoryData,
    T1.special_category_basis_c AS DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
    T1.retention_c AS DSARetention,
    T1.destruction_c AS DSADestruction,
    T1.who_will_have_access_c AS DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
    T1.transfers_outside_of_uk_c AS DSATransfersOutsideUK,
    T1.data_sharing_num_container_c AS DataSharingNumberContainer,
    T1.help AS DSAHelp,
    T1.data_discloser_c AS DSADataDiscloser,
    T1.data_receiver_c AS DSADataReceiver,
    T1.dsa_schedules AS DSASchedules,
    T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1 AS DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
    T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1_name AS DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
    T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1documents_ida AS DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
    T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1 AS DSAIMSIntegration,
    T1.controllership_type_c AS DSAControllershipType,
    T1.date_of_next_review_c AS DSADateNextReview,
    T1.end_date_c AS DSAEndDate,
    T1.party_1_c AS DSAParty1,
    T1.party_1_contact_c AS DSAParty1Contact,
    T1.party_2_c AS DSAParty2,
    T1.party_2_contact_c AS DSAParty2Contact,
    T1.party_3_c AS DSAParty3,
    T1.party_3_contact_c AS DSAParty3Contact,
    T1.personal_data_shared_c AS DSAPersonalDataShared,
    T1.special_category_data_shared_c AS DSASpecialCategoryData,
    T1.start_date_c AS DSAStartDate,
    T1.user_id_c AS DSAUserID,
    T1.information_owner_c AS DSAInformationOwner,
    T1.user_id1_c AS DSAUser1ID,
    T1.information_expert_c AS DSAInformationExpert,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_d_c AS LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
    T1.planning_legislation_c AS DSAPlanningLegislation,
    T1.third_party_recipients_c AS DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
    T1.review_period_c AS DSAReviewPeriod,
    T1.date_modified AS DSADateModified,
    T1.SecurityGroups AS DSASecurityGroups,
    T1.assigned_user_link AS DSAAssignedUserLink,
    T1.created_by AS DSACreatedBy,
    T1.created_by_link AS DSACreatedByLink,
    T1.created_by_name AS DSACreatedByName,
    T1.date_entered AS DSADateEntered,
    T1.deleted AS DSADeleted,
    T1.modified_by_name AS DSAModifiedByName,
    T1.modified_user_id AS DSAModifiedByUserID,
    T1.modified_user_link AS DSAModifiedByUserLink,
    T1.resolution AS DSAResolution,
    T1.work_log AS DSAWorkLog,
    T2.SourceSystemID                               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        '.', 
        '.',
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_being_shared_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.direction_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.why_shared_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.how_shared_securely_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.how_stored_securely_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.frequency_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.lawful_basis_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.personal_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.special_category_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.special_category_basis_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.destruction_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.who_will_have_access_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transfers_outside_of_uk_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_sharing_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_discloser_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_receiver_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dsa_schedules,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1documents_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.controllership_type_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.end_date_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.party_1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.party_1_contact_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.party_2_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.party_2_contact_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.party_3_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.party_3_contact_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.personal_data_shared_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.special_category_data_shared_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.start_date_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_d_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.planning_legislation_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.third_party_recipients_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.review_period_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.')))              AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                             AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_dsa_new T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_dsa_dim T3 
    ON  T1.ims_data_sharing_number = T3.DSANumber AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.ims_data_sharing_number = T3.DSANumber AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        '.', 
                        '.', 
                        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.data_being_shared_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.direction_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.why_shared_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.how_shared_securely_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.how_stored_securely_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.frequency_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.lawful_basis_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.personal_data_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.special_category_data_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.special_category_basis_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.retention_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.destruction_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.who_will_have_access_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.transfers_outside_of_uk_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.data_sharing_num_container_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.data_discloser_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.data_receiver_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.dsa_schedules,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_data_sharing_1documents_ida,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.controllership_type_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.end_date_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.party_1_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.party_1_contact_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.party_2_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.party_2_contact_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.party_3_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.party_3_contact_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.personal_data_shared_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.special_category_data_shared_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.start_date_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_d_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.planning_legislation_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.third_party_recipients_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.review_period_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.')))  <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.DSANumber IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.ims_data_sharing_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_dsa_new);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_dsa_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_dsa_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_dsa_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSDSAID,
    DSAID,
    DSAIDCoded,
    DSAName,
    DSAAssignedUserID,
    DSAAssignedUserName,
    DSANumber,
    DSAType,
    DSAStatus,
    DSAPriority,
    DSADataBeingShared,
    DSADirection,
    DSAWhyShared,
    DSAHowSharedSecurely,
    DSAHowStoredSecurely,
    DSAFrequency,
    LawfulBasis,
    DSAPersonalData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
    DSARetention,
    DSADestruction,
    DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
    DSATransfersOutsideUK,
    DataSharingNumberContainer,
    DSAHelp,
    DSADataDiscloser,
    DSADataReceiver,
    DSASchedules,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
    DSAIMSIntegration,
    DSAControllershipType,
    DSADateNextReview,
    DSAEndDate,
    DSAParty1,
    DSAParty1Contact,
    DSAParty2,
    DSAParty2Contact,
    DSAParty3,
    DSAParty3Contact,
    DSAPersonalDataShared,
    DSASpecialCategoryData,
    DSAStartDate,
    DSAUserID,
    DSAInformationOwner,
    DSAUser1ID,
    DSAInformationExpert,
    LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
    DSAPlanningLegislation,
    DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
    DSAReviewPeriod,
    DSADateModified,
    DSASecurityGroups,
    DSAAssignedUserLink,
    DSACreatedBy,
    DSACreatedByLink,
    DSACreatedByName,
    DSADateEntered,
    DSADeleted,
    DSAModifiedByName,
    DSAModifiedByUserID,
    DSAModifiedByUserLink,
    DSAResolution,
    DSAWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_dsa_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSDSAID,
    DSAID,
    DSAIDCoded,
    DSAName,
    DSAAssignedUserID,
    DSAAssignedUserName,
    DSANumber,
    DSAType,
    DSAStatus,
    DSAPriority,
    DSADataBeingShared,
    DSADirection,
    DSAWhyShared,
    DSAHowSharedSecurely,
    DSAHowStoredSecurely,
    DSAFrequency,
    LawfulBasis,
    DSAPersonalData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
    DSARetention,
    DSADestruction,
    DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
    DSATransfersOutsideUK,
    DataSharingNumberContainer,
    DSAHelp,
    DSADataDiscloser,
    DSADataReceiver,
    DSASchedules,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
    DSAIMSIntegration,
    DSAControllershipType,
    DSADateNextReview,
    DSAEndDate,
    DSAParty1,
    DSAParty1Contact,
    DSAParty2,
    DSAParty2Contact,
    DSAParty3,
    DSAParty3Contact,
    DSAPersonalDataShared,
    DSASpecialCategoryData,
    DSAStartDate,
    DSAUserID,
    DSAInformationOwner,
    DSAUser1ID,
    DSAInformationExpert,
    LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
    DSAPlanningLegislation,
    DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
    DSAReviewPeriod,
    DSADateModified,
    DSASecurityGroups,
    DSAAssignedUserLink,
    DSACreatedBy,
    DSACreatedByLink,
    DSACreatedByName,
    DSADateEntered,
    DSADeleted,
    DSAModifiedByName,
    DSAModifiedByUserID,
    DSAModifiedByUserLink,
    DSAResolution,
    DSAWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_dsa_dim
WHERE DSANumber IN (SELECT DSANumber FROM ims_dsa_dim_new WHERE IMSDSAID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_dsa_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_dsa_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSDSAID,
    DSAID,
    DSAIDCoded,
    DSAName,
    DSAAssignedUserID,
    DSAAssignedUserName,
    DSANumber,
    DSAType,
    DSAStatus,
    DSAPriority,
    DSADataBeingShared,
    DSADirection,
    DSAWhyShared,
    DSAHowSharedSecurely,
    DSAHowStoredSecurely,
    DSAFrequency,
    LawfulBasis,
    DSAPersonalData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
    DSARetention,
    DSADestruction,
    DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
    DSATransfersOutsideUK,
    DataSharingNumberContainer,
    DSAHelp,
    DSADataDiscloser,
    DSADataReceiver,
    DSASchedules,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
    DSAIMSIntegration,
    DSAControllershipType,
    DSADateNextReview,
    DSAEndDate,
    DSAParty1,
    DSAParty1Contact,
    DSAParty2,
    DSAParty2Contact,
    DSAParty3,
    DSAParty3Contact,
    DSAPersonalDataShared,
    DSASpecialCategoryData,
    DSAStartDate,
    DSAUserID,
    DSAInformationOwner,
    DSAUser1ID,
    DSAInformationExpert,
    LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
    DSAPlanningLegislation,
    DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
    DSAReviewPeriod,
    DSADateModified,
    DSASecurityGroups,
    DSAAssignedUserLink,
    DSACreatedBy,
    DSACreatedByLink,
    DSACreatedByName,
    DSADateEntered,
    DSADeleted,
    DSAModifiedByName,
    DSAModifiedByUserID,
    DSAModifiedByUserLink,
    DSAResolution,
    DSAWorkLog,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_dsa_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_dsa_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_dsa_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_dsa_dim AS Target
USING ims_dsa_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSDSAID = Target.IMSDSAID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSDSAID,
        DSAID,
        DSAIDCoded,
        DSAName,
        DSAAssignedUserID,
        DSAAssignedUserName,
        DSANumber,
        DSAType,
        DSAStatus,
        DSAPriority,
        DSADataBeingShared,
        DSADirection,
        DSAWhyShared,
        DSAHowSharedSecurely,
        DSAHowStoredSecurely,
        DSAFrequency,
        LawfulBasis,
        DSAPersonalData,
        DSAPersonalCategoryData,
        DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
        DSARetention,
        DSADestruction,
        DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
        DSATransfersOutsideUK,
        DataSharingNumberContainer,
        DSAHelp,
        DSADataDiscloser,
        DSADataReceiver,
        DSASchedules,
        DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
        DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
        DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
        DSAIMSIntegration,
        DSAControllershipType,
        DSADateNextReview,
        DSAEndDate,
        DSAParty1,
        DSAParty1Contact,
        DSAParty2,
        DSAParty2Contact,
        DSAParty3,
        DSAParty3Contact,
        DSAPersonalDataShared,
        DSASpecialCategoryData,
        DSAStartDate,
        DSAUserID,
        DSAInformationOwner,
        DSAUser1ID,
        DSAInformationExpert,
        LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
        DSAPlanningLegislation,
        DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
        DSAReviewPeriod,
        DSADateModified,
        DSASecurityGroups,
        DSAAssignedUserLink,
        DSACreatedBy,
        DSACreatedByLink,
        DSACreatedByName,
        DSADateEntered,
        DSADeleted,
        DSAModifiedByName,
        DSAModifiedByUserID,
        DSAModifiedByUserLink,
        DSAResolution,
        DSAWorkLog,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSDSAID,
        Source.DSAID,
        Source.DSAIDCoded,
        Source.DSAName,
        Source.DSAAssignedUserID,
        Source.DSAAssignedUserName,
        Source.DSANumber,
        Source.DSAType,
        Source.DSAStatus,
        Source.DSAPriority,
        Source.DSADataBeingShared,
        Source.DSADirection,
        Source.DSAWhyShared,
        Source.DSAHowSharedSecurely,
        Source.DSAHowStoredSecurely,
        Source.DSAFrequency,
        Source.LawfulBasis,
        Source.DSAPersonalData,
        Source.DSAPersonalCategoryData,
        Source.DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
        Source.DSARetention,
        Source.DSADestruction,
        Source.DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
        Source.DSATransfersOutsideUK,
        Source.DataSharingNumberContainer,
        Source.DSAHelp,
        Source.DSADataDiscloser,
        Source.DSADataReceiver,
        Source.DSASchedules,
        Source.DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
        Source.DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
        Source.DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
        Source.DSAIMSIntegration,
        Source.DSAControllershipType,
        Source.DSADateNextReview,
        Source.DSAEndDate,
        Source.DSAParty1,
        Source.DSAParty1Contact,
        Source.DSAParty2,
        Source.DSAParty2Contact,
        Source.DSAParty3,
        Source.DSAParty3Contact,
        Source.DSAPersonalDataShared,
        Source.DSASpecialCategoryData,
        Source.DSAStartDate,
        Source.DSAUserID,
        Source.DSAInformationOwner,
        Source.DSAUser1ID,
        Source.DSAInformationExpert,
        Source.LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
        Source.DSAPlanningLegislation,
        Source.DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
        Source.DSAReviewPeriod,
        Source.DSADateModified,
        Source.DSASecurityGroups,
        Source.DSAAssignedUserLink,
        Source.DSACreatedBy,
        Source.DSACreatedByLink,
        Source.DSACreatedByName,
        Source.DSADateEntered,
        Source.DSADeleted,
        Source.DSAModifiedByName,
        Source.DSAModifiedByUserID,
        Source.DSAModifiedByUserLink,
        Source.DSAResolution,
        Source.DSAWorkLog,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_dsa_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_dsa_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSDSAID NULLS LAST) AS IMSDSAID,
    DSAID,
    DSAIDCoded,
    DSAName,
    DSAAssignedUserID,
    DSAAssignedUserName,
    DSANumber,
    DSAType,
    DSAStatus,
    DSAPriority,
    DSADataBeingShared,
    DSADirection,
    DSAWhyShared,
    DSAHowSharedSecurely,
    DSAHowStoredSecurely,
    DSAFrequency,
    LawfulBasis,
    DSAPersonalData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryData,
    DSAPersonalCategoryBasis,
    DSARetention,
    DSADestruction,
    DSAWhoWillHaveAccess,
    DSATransfersOutsideUK,
    DataSharingNumberContainer,
    DSAHelp,
    DSADataDiscloser,
    DSADataReceiver,
    DSASchedules,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharing,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingName,
    DocumentsIMSDataSharingDocumentsIDA,
    DSAIMSIntegration,
    DSAControllershipType,
    DSADateNextReview,
    DSAEndDate,
    DSAParty1,
    DSAParty1Contact,
    DSAParty2,
    DSAParty2Contact,
    DSAParty3,
    DSAParty3Contact,
    DSAPersonalDataShared,
    DSASpecialCategoryData,
    DSAStartDate,
    DSAUserID,
    DSAInformationOwner,
    DSAUser1ID,
    DSAInformationExpert,
    LastCurrentAndAccurateDC,
    DSAPlanningLegislation,
    DSAThirdPartyRecipients,
    DSAReviewPeriod,
    DSADateModified,
    DSASecurityGroups,
    DSAAssignedUserLink,
    DSACreatedBy,
    DSACreatedByLink,
    DSACreatedByName,
    DSADateEntered,
    DSADeleted,
    DSAModifiedByName,
    DSAModifiedByUserID,
    DSAModifiedByUserLink,
    DSAResolution,
    DSAWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_dsa_dim ;
